meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by meningomyclisis (surgical division of the spinal cord and meninges).
meanings.english_definition: Relating to or characterized by meningomyclisis (surgical division of the spinal cord and meninges).

etymology.value: Derived from 'meningo-' (referring to the meninges), 'myelo-' (referring to the spinal cord), and 'clitic' (referring to surgical division or breaking).
